Quet:

"I insist to heard Scourge's opinion"replied the male "But I'll 
heard, Rodimu's too.  "


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> She glared at Quet. Wanting so desperately to let him have it for 
dragging 
> Scourge into this. Even Scourge didn't have rights to staying 
here. No one 
> should stay here. Somehow, she had to make sure of that. It was a 
mistake she was 
> not bound to make again. 
> 
> "I think Rodimus Prime has the last word on this one." Pausing a 
moment. "As 
> to why... that is my own personal reasons," she glared at Quet. 
All she knew 
> is she felt.. for once. It's not a plan well thought out decision, 
but a drive &
>  desire to protect those she cared for... especially one in 
particular.
